name: Red Velvet Sheet Pan Cake
description: Sweet vanilla with hints of chocolate! This red velvet sheet pan cake is fluffy, soft, and a perfect celebration breaky.

ingredients.name: gluten-free flour, such as rice flour or all-purpose, gluten-free baking flour

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 425° F. Line 1⁄4 Sheet Pan with 1⁄4 Sheet Pan Liner. Lightly oil liner.
  2. In a large bowl, combine cupcake mix, egg, milk, flour, and 2 tbsp oil. Let rest 3 min to thicken. 
  3. Pour batter onto pan; spread evenly to fill corners. Bake 12–14 min, or until a toothpick inserted in centre of cake comes out clean.
  4. Slice and serve with toppings, if desired.
